bio.content: The correct spelling is Thriller U. Trilla U was born in Kingston Jamaica August 14 1969, names Eustace Adolphus Hamilton. While attending the Spanish Town Secondary School in St. Catherine Jamaica, his interest in music and songwriting along with his amazing talents started to develop and it was there he started to branch out and take his talents to higher levels in the music industry. His debut LP in 1986 , at the age of 17, reflected his tremendous talents with the No. 1 hit on the United Kingdom Album Charts called Waiting for You , remaining solid at no.1 for eight consecutive weeks. His vibrant first single Juggling surged to no.1 on the Jamaican top 40 charts, spending over five weeks , being followed by other no.1 hits including Young and She Green (featuring Johnny P) and I'll Prove it to You , both represented by Technique Label. While having the privilege of working with labels in Japan such as overheat records Avex Tracks and JVC/Victor Music Incorporated, in association with well known producers from the USA such as Guru from Jazz Matazz, Sly & Robby and Rap artist Krs 1. By 1989 Trilla U was honored Best New Singer of the Year by the Jammy Annual Awards, leading to exclusive recordings with a variety of producers locally and internationally , such as King Jammy's ..Shizui Ishii, Roy Francis, Philip (fattis) Burrell Donavan German and Steelie and Clevie. The 90's was a clear success with releases such as Love Rules , Best of Me and On ans On, rising to international reconition touring USA , Canada, Japan ,Caribbean and the UK, with performances along side major artist such as Maxi Priest, Beenie Man , Sizzla and R&B sensations Monica , En Vogue, Big Mountain and Third World . In 1998 Trilla U exploited the boundaries and collaborated with three other artist/singers Lukie D, Singing Melody and Tony Curtis forming the LUST group with combined vocal abilities and hitting the charts with a no. 1 hit called Sweetness of Your Love . Currently Trilla U is working on his new CD titled “Trilla U Constantly”, booked to released mid 2008 along with hits such as 'Luv You', Dominion, Crazy Thoughts, So Sorry and S.E.X. Layout by CoolChaser ck out www.myspace.com/trillau it's the same thriller u Read more on Last.fm.
